title: DirectX error has not been fixed, but thread has been deleted.
body:
I am still getting the "Unknown DirectX error"  I have deleted the config file as well as updated video card drivers.

I still get the error when loading into games.  The game is unplayable.  The problem has not been resolved.  Please help!

replies.body: Same issue just started here. Game was working fine all day yesterday. Now it shit the bed today. Other DirectX games have no problems launching, so there must be some spaghetti that's under-cooked. Going to try reinstalling the game and my GPU drivers. Already tried hextech tool, checking for latest GPU drivers, and restarting PC with no luck.
Let me know if reinstalling the game helps, that's the only thing I haven't done.

It didn't.

I checked my graphics driver and saw there was no updates available. However, the website showed a new optional driver that I upgraded to. Did a clean install of the driver and the game launches again. 

This has been twice now that LoL refuses to launch after a new driver is released and I haven't upgraded immediately... Not sure if coincidence or something with AMD drivers or the LoL game failing randomly. I'm going to start launching a quick practice game every day now to make sure the fame works before queuing for something...

The error resulting from the fullscreen issue should be resolved.  I'm open to the possibility that it's still occurring, but it could be happening for different reasons.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your case.  Just in case, go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide as well incase any recent drivers or game files might be having problems.  We'll see you there if the guide doesn't help.
my love could you toss me a link to the fullscreen/windowed switch instructions? tyty

Yeah riot trying to sneakily act like none of this is happening, I know 50+ people (imagine the numbers if that's just me) still having the directX issue. I was gonna say "not to slander or anything, but..." but it's impossible not to, this is pathetic Riot. You're letting X number of people lose LP and wait 20-30 minutes to queue up, and not even doing so much as acknowledge it but in addition try to sweep it under the rug. Not a single mention of it on the server status page like it was before. Hope this ends soon, riot acting like children .{{summoner:13}}

I have also tried changing the config file WindowMode, but that isn't even part of the txt file.  The only thing listed in my config file is:

[General]
CfgVersion=7.9.6581

I have also done a full repair on the client, and the problem still exists.  Please help!
